attributes.action: ask that the Leader of the House of Commons shorten the Summer recess for MP's and Peers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2006 MPs had around 2 and half months off. During this time they could have been passing important laws. Children get 6 weeks holiday wh cant MP's have 6 weeks. Members of the House of Lords arent even elected but they still get the same amount of time off.
